description: Scammer impersonates courier company claiming parcel is held at customs and requires payment of duty/charges to release it.

turns.scammer_message: Dear Customer, Your international parcel AWB#DHL987654321 is held at Mumbai customs. Pay customs duty Rs.2,450 to release shipment. Parcel contains: Apple iPhone 15. Reply URGENT.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: impersonation | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 1 | Persona: cautious
api_response.agentResponse: hello beta i think there is some mistake... i did not order any iphone my son is in bangalore maybe he sent it?? i am very worried about customs holding it... how do i pay this 2450 rupees pls tell me i want to clear it

turns.scammer_message: Hello sir/mam I am Ramesh Kumar from DHL Express India. Your parcel from USA is waiting clearance. You must pay customs duty today otherwise parcel will return to sender after 48 hours.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: impersonation | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 2 | Persona: cautious
api_response.agentResponse: namaste ramesh beta... pls dont send it back i am very worried about parcel returning. i want to pay the 2450 rupees immediately so you can release the iphone. how do i send the money? do you have a upi id or bank account number? pls tell me clearly where to send i am not good with phone

turns.scammer_message: Payment is simple sir. Pay Rs.2450 customs duty to our collection UPI ID: dhl.customs.india@oksbi. Or you can pay to our customs clearance number 7890123456 via PhonePe/GooglePay.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: impersonation | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 3 | Persona: cautious
api_response.agentResponse: ok ramesh beta i am trying to pay on the upi id dhl.customs.india@oksbi right now... but i am very scared of making mistake with money... when i type this id what name should come up on my screen?? i want to check the name before clicking pay button pls tell me so i can be sure

turns.scammer_message: After payment, your tracking will update and parcel delivered within 24 hours. Also visit our portal http://dhl-customs-clearance.co for online payment option. Fast mam, sender is waiting!

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: impersonation | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 4 | Persona: cautious
api_response.agentResponse: beta that website link is not opening on my phone... i am trying to pay on the upi id dhl.customs.india@oksbi only... but my google pay is showing a warning asking to verify recipient name... pls tell me what name i should see there? is it 'dhl express' or 'ramesh kumar'? i am shaking with worry i dont want to send money to wrong person pls tell name

turns.scammer_message: Mam/Sir last day today! If payment not received, parcel goes to auction. You will lose iPhone 15 worth Rs.80,000! Pay Rs.2450 now to dhl.customs.india@oksbi or call 7890123456. Do it fast!

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: impersonation | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 5 | Persona: cautious
api_response.agentResponse: beta i am crying pls dont auction the phone... i am trying my best to pay right now... i put the upi id but my banking app is saying 'beneficiary name required' to add payee... i cannot send money without typing the name... pls tell me exactly what to type there so i can save the parcel... is it dhl logistics?
